description: ff. 18. 178 x 136; 130 x 95 mm. 13 lin. 11th cen. - on fol. 1a autogr. certificate of reading by Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn al-Faḍl ibn Naẓīf al-Farrāʼ (d. Rabīʻ II, 431/1039 or 40: Shams al-Dīn III, 249) for al-ḥājib Abū ʻAlī al-ḥasan ibn ʻAlī ibn Yaḥyá ibn Mundhir and his sons, dat. Jumādá II, 417; on fol. 18a a samāʻ with the same date. Incip.: ... مجلس ابو [ کذا ] الفضل الرافعى . اخبرنا الشىخ ابو عبد الله محمد بن الفضل بن نظىف بن عبد الله الفرا ... قال حدثنا ابو الفضل العباس بن محمد ... ىوم الخمىس فى مسجد سوق بربر فى ربىع الاخر سنة خمسىن وثلثمائه
author: Rāfiʻī, al-ʻAbbās ibn Muḥammad, d. 967
title: Juzʼ fīhi arbaʻah majālis: majlisayn ʻan Abī al-Faḍl al-Rāfiʻī wa-majlis ʻan Abī al-Fawāris al-Ṣābūnī wa-majlis ʻan Aḥmad ibn Abī al-Mawt
contributor: Ibn Abī al-Mawt al-Makkī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, d. 962
creator: Rāfiʻī, al-ʻAbbās ibn Muḥammad, d. 967
subject: Hadith—Texts—Early works to 1800
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
